title: DAug: Diffusion-based Channel Augmentation for Radiology Image Retrieval and Classification
details: Y Jin, Z Zhou, H Fang, JN Hwang - arXiv preprint arXiv:2412.04828, 2024
abstract: Medical image understanding requires meticulous examination of fine visual details, with particular regions requiring additional attention. While radiologists build such expertise over years of experience, it is challenging for AI models to learn where to …
